page.title: 12AGRICULTURE CONT.
page.content: {CROPS.}TWENTY FIVE ACRES OF{WHEAT}HAVE BEEN GROWN THIS YEAR WHICH SHOULD YIELD SEVENTY TONS.CONTRACT WORK IS USED TO HARVEST THIS.{HAY}SIXTEEN ACRES.{PERMANENT PASTURE}THIRTY ACRES. NO ROTATION OF CROPS AS SUCH BUT THERE IS A SYSTEM.TWO YEARS WHEAT,ONE YEAR BARLEY THEN BACK TO GRASS FOR ABOUT FIVE YEARS.CATTLE ARE WINTERED IN AND OTHER LARGE BARNS ARE USED FOR STORING HAY AND STRAW.THERE IS ONLY ONE TRACTOR AS MOST OF THE OTHER WORK IS CONTRACTED OUT. {CHURCH HILL FARM.}THIS IS A TROUT FARM WHERE ONE IS ABLE TO FISH FOR TROUT. FOR A CERTAIN FEE THREE FISH CAN BE KEPT AND THE REST RETURNED TO THE POOL.
